targets.rawSql: SELECT count(*) FROM analytics.data WHERE timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <=  $__toTime
select count(distinct type) from data WHERE timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <=  $__toTime;

WITH vistors_before as (SELECT user_id
                        FROM analytics.data
                        where timestamp < $__fromTime
                        group by user_id)
SELECT count(users) as total
FROM (SELECT count(*) as users FROM analytics.data WHERE timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <=  $__toTime AND user_id NOT IN (select user_id from vistors_before) GROUP BY user_id);

WITH times as (SELECT session_id,
                      max(timestamp)                    as end_of_session,
                      min(timestamp)                    as start_of_session,
                      end_of_session - start_of_session as delta_ts
               FROM data
               WHERE timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <=  $__toTime
               GROUP BY session_id
               ORDER BY session_id)

SELECT avg(delta_ts)
from times;

SELECT sum(device_brand ILIKE 'apple' AND isNotNull(device_brand))                                       AS apple,
       sum(device_brand ILIKE 'google' AND isNotNull(device_brand))                                      AS google,
       sum(isNull(device_brand) OR (device_brand NOT ILIKE 'apple' AND device_brand NOT ILIKE 'google')) AS unknown_brand,
           sum(data.device_type ILIKE 'smartphone' AND isNotNull(data.device_type))                                       AS mobile,
    sum(data.device_type ILIKE 'pc' AND isNotNull(data.device_type))                                      AS desktop,
    sum(isNull(data.device_type) OR (data.device_type NOT ILIKE 'smartphone' AND data.device_type NOT ILIKE 'pc')) AS unknown_type

from data
    WHERE timestamp >=  $__fromTime AND timestamp <=  $__toTime;
SELECT country_code as metric, count(*) as value  FROM data WHERE $__timeFilter(`timestamp`) GROUP BY country_code;

SELECT country_name, count(*) as Total, concat(country_name, ' - ', Total) as Country FROM analytics.data
WHERE timestamp >=  $__fromTime AND timestamp <=  $__toTime
group by country_name ORDER BY Total DESC 
LIMIT 10;

SELECT city_name, count(*) as Total, concat(city_name, ' - ', Total) as City FROM analytics.data
WHERE timestamp >=  $__fromTime AND timestamp <=  $__toTime
group by city_name ORDER BY Total DESC 
LIMIT 10;

SELECT DISTINCT path, count(*) as Total
FROM data
WHERE timestamp >=  $__fromTime AND timestamp <=  $__toTime
GROUP BY path
ORDER BY Total DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT browser_name, count(*) as Total FROM analytics.data
WHERE timestamp >=  $__fromTime AND timestamp <=  $__toTime
group by browser_name ORDER BY Total DESC 
LIMIT 10;

SELECT initcap(device_type), count(*) as Total FROM analytics.data
WHERE timestamp >=  $__fromTime AND timestamp <=  $__toTime
group by device_type ORDER BY Total DESC 
LIMIT 10;

SELECT initcap(device_os_name), count(*) as Total FROM analytics.data
WHERE timestamp >=  $__fromTime AND timestamp <=  $__toTime
group by device_os_name ORDER BY Total DESC 
LIMIT 10;

SELECT type, count(*) as Total FROM analytics.data
WHERE timestamp >=  $__fromTime AND timestamp <=  $__toTime
group by type ORDER BY Total DESC 
LIMIT 10;

SELECT device_brand, count(*) as Total FROM analytics.data
WHERE timestamp >=  $__fromTime AND timestamp <=  $__toTime
group by device_brand ORDER BY Total DESC 
LIMIT 10;

SELECT upper(locale), count(*) as Total  FROM analytics.data
WHERE timestamp >=  $__fromTime AND timestamp <=  $__toTime
group by locale ORDER BY Total DESC 
LIMIT 10;
